item.description:
Come meet other Christian Professionals and discuss the sharing of faith in our work and in the workplace. We will be sharing our expereinces, requesting prayers, networking with one another, and strengthening each other to do His glory.

"As iron sharpens iron, so one man sharpens another." - Proverbs 27:17

The location will be Panera Bread in Framingham. I'll be wearing a red hat.

Tentative Agenda:
7:00pm - 7:15pm -- Mingle
7:15pm - 8:15pm -- Introductions
8:15pm - 8:45pm -- Sharing & Discussion
8:45pm - 9:00pm -- Prayers

See you all then.
item.name: Feb 20 Christian Professionals and Entrepreneurs Meetup
